import React from 'react' import { Button,NavDropdown,Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Components.css'; import {useState} from 'react'; function AddModal({add}) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const [newM, setNewM] = useState([]); const handleChange=(event)=>{ setNewM(el=>({...el,[event.target.name]:event.target.value})) } return (
Add new movie
) } export default AddModal
